SA15bsa0553u:3: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:9: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau /
SA15bsa0553u:12: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:15: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:17: nanu yadaikameva kāryyamaṅkurādikamutpadyate, tadā kathaṃ kāryyagatakramākramavyavastheti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:22: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:24: yasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvannāsti, na tat śaktaṃ, yathā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:25: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:27: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:28: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:35: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
SA15bsa0553u:43: nanu vyāpakānupalambhataḥ sattvasya kathaṃ svasādhyaprativandhasidviḥ, asyāpyanekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:44: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:49: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:50: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:53: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:54: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15bsa0553u:62: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:72: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāntadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:81: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet /
SA15bsa0553u:88: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
SA15bsa0553u:93: satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15bsa0553u:98: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15bsa0553u:100: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:102: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi //
SA15bsa0553u:103: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:107: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:109: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
SA15bsa0553u:114: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:118: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
SA15bsa0553u:126: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:129: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:133: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti /
SA15bsa0553u:141: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:147: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā /
SA15bsa0553u:151: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
SA15bsa0553u:154: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:155: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti //
SA15bsa0553u:157: iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ, paṭe śuklatvaṃ turage gamanamityādi /
SA15bsa0553u:158: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15bsa0553u:161: prathamapakṣe sidvasādhanaṃ dvitīyapakṣe tu svavacanavirodhaḥ / yadāhu rguravaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:167: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:169: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
SA15bsa0553u:176: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:179: tathāvastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:184: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:186: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:187: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:189: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati /
SA15bsa0553u:190: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa0553u:191: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa0553u:192: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:201: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:205: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānañca /
SA15bsa0553u:208: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:212: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:213: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt /
SA15bsa0553u:217: pūrvvaṃ sandigdhavastukaḥ, samarthite tu hetāvavastuka iti brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:229: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0553u:233: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0553u:235: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā /
SA15bsa0553u:241: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat /
SA15bsa0553u:242: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati /
SA15bsa0553u:245: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:250: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15bsa0553u:253: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:255: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt, svātantryāt /
SA15bsa0553u:263: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:265: śthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:270: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:272: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
SA15bsa0553u:273: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
SA15bsa0553u:275: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:280: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:281: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:285: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:287: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:291: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:292: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:293: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:295: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:296: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:297: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca /
SA15bsa0553u:302: sa cāvisambādī vyavahāraḥ pariharttumaśakyaḥ; yadvyāpakaśūnyaṃ; tadvāpyaśūnyamiti /
SA15bsa0553u:304: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:308: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye 'pi yadi bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:309: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā /
SA15bsa0553u:312: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:316: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:327: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:328: na ca dvitīye 'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:332: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt /
SA15bsa0553u:333: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:334: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:344_0: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
SA15bsa0553u:344_1: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt
SA15bsa0553u:345: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:350: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:358: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:363: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate 'smābhirupapadyate vā /
SA15bsa0553u:368: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:371: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma /
SA15bsa0553u:374: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:375: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve 'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:376: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:380: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:381: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
SA15bsa0553u:390: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī //
